txt.en: Your pursuit of the Song begins.
Fight alongside Jajax in Umbar-môkh
'You may want to stand back.'
'Rothog?'
'Let me out of here! You must let me out!'
Jajax has suggested that you search the bodies of the slain guards to see if either of them have the keys to the gaol.
Belondor and Rothog entered the gaol from a hatch downstairs that leads to Umbar-môkh. Now you should find your way downstairs to escape!
Tatháta stands by the hatch leading to Umbar-môkh.
Belondor stands by the hatch leading to Umbar-môkh.
Tatháta stands by the hatch leading to Umbar-môkh.
The path of your escape leads into Umbar-môkh.
You and Jajax have escaped from the gaol, but there are foes between you and the hidden harbour.
'It would appear our prisoners have second thoughts.'
'TBD - Blah!'
Your foes now defeated, the way to the hidden harbour is open to you.

Descend into Umbar-môkh

'TBD - Blah!'

Talk to Jajax
Remain alert
Talk to Belondor in the Fleetfast gaol
Talk to Jajax
'Thank you, oh thank you!'
'You will not regret this!'
Search the bodies of the slain guards for the keys to the gaol
'How can I ever repay you?'
'I thought I would die in there!'
'We are free? Can it be so?'
'Hey! Let me out!'
'You cannot leave me here!'
'Hey! Do you have the keys?'
'Freedom is mine!'
'That Jajax thinks he knows so much!'
'Why are you doing this? I cannot believe it!'
'Is this a trick?'
'Let me out!'
'Where did you put the keys?'
'You cannot leave us here!'
'Get them!'
Instance: The Uprising Begins
Jajax is in one of the cages of the Fleetfast gaol.
There is a commotion outside the cage in the Fleetfast gaol.
Belondor and Rothog have come to free you from the Fleetfast gaol.
Jajax is in the Fleetfast gaol.
Jajax has suggested that you search the bodies of the slain guards to see if either of them have the keys to the gaol.
You and Jajax have been overwhelmed!
After travelling for a short distance, you hear the sound of foes ahead of you
Tatháta's ship is moored in the hidden harbour
And so the ship Sotóka made for Gondor in pursuit of The Song and a desperate hope
But some of those who sailed that way would never return
Tidings from the city outside are cut off from the prisoners in the Fleetfast gaol. What is happening in Umbar Baharbêl?
This guard does not have the keys to the gaol
You found a ring containing keys to the cages in the Fleetfast gaol!
Tatháta and Jajax stand by the hatch leading to Umbar-môkh
'What is happening out there?'
Talk to Jajax in the ship Sotóka
'One of these guards might have the keys.'
Tatháta eyes you carefully
Talk to Belondor in the ship Sotóka
'You should free us some friends on our way out!'
Talk to Rothog in the ship Sotóka
'Attack!'
Talk to Tatháta in her ship Sotóka
'Ha ha ha ha! It is good to get my blood flowing again!'
'Why have you not already left, Tatháta?'
'Tatháta's ship is near!'
Pursue the Song to Gondor
You should board Tatháta's ship so you may pursue the Song.
Talk to Jajax in Umbar-môkh
Make your way to the hidden harbour
Board Tatháta's ship and go belowdecks
Your allies stand ready to pursue the Song.
Pass the time as best you can
Follow Jajax
